## Data Preprocessing

```{r}
cdi_data = read.csv("./data/cdi.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  mutate(crime_rate = crimes/pop,
         cty_state = str_c(cty,",",state)) %>% 
  relocate(cty_state,cty)

cdi_cor = cdi_data %>%
  select(-id,-cty,-state, -cty_state) %>%
  cor() 

corrplot(cdi_cor)

```
